attributes.action: abandon plans to create additional police powers to stop and question
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On 27 May 2007, the Prime Minister and Home Secretary trailed proposals to allow police officers to arbitrarily stop and question without any suspicion.  This represents an intrusion on everyone's civil liberties and will further increase the climate of cynicism in this country.
